com.esri.gpt.catalog.arcims
Class ImsHttpClient

java.lang.Object
  com.esri.gpt.catalog.arcims.ImsClient
      com.esri.gpt.catalog.arcims.ImsHttpClient

public class ImsHttpClient
extends ImsClient

Provides a basic client for out-bound ArcIMS HTTP communication.
